BRIDGClass.Name: DefinedObservation
BRIDGClass.Description: An activity defined at a global library level whose intention is to obtain a result by observing, monitoring, measuring or otherwise qualitatively or quantitatively gathering data or information about one or more aspects of a study subject's or experimental unit's physiologic or psychologic state.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: bodyPositionCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying the 3-dimensional spatial orientation of a subject during a particular observation.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: focalDateRange
BRIDGAttribute.Description: The time period in which the observation result is held to be true, expressed either as a simple date range or as an evaluable expression that references a study-defined date or milestone.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: focalDuration
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A quantity of time in which the observation result is held to be true.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: methodCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying the technique that is used for the observation.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: targetAnatomicSiteCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying the anatomic location that is the focus of the observation.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: targetAnatomicSiteLateralityCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying the side of the body (or a paired organ) that is a target site for an observation.

BRIDGClass.Name: DefinedObservationResult
BRIDGClass.Description: A reusable, 'template' description of a possible outcome of an observation.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: comment
BRIDGAttribute.Description: Additional description of the observation result.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: confidentialityCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying the degree of privacy applicable for the observation result.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: derivationExpression
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A character string containing a formal language expression that specifies how the observation result's attributes are, should be, or have been derived from input parameters associated with activity.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: result
BRIDGAttribute.Description: Data or information that is determined by an act of observation.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: targetAnatomicSiteCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying the anatomic location that is the focus of an observation result.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: targetAnatomicSiteLateralityCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying the side of the body (or a paired organ) that is a target site for a procedure.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: targetCodingSystem
BRIDGAttribute.Description: The coding system to use for recording results for the associated activity or evaluation.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: typeCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying the kind of observation result.

BRIDGClass.Name: PerformedObservation
BRIDGClass.Description: The completed action of observing, monitoring, measuring or otherwise qualitatively or quantitatively gathering data or information about one or more aspects of a subject's, study subject's or experimental unit's physiologic or psychologic state.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: bodyPositionCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying the 3-dimensional spatial orientation of a subject during a particular observation.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: focalDateRange
BRIDGAttribute.Description: The time period in which the observation result is held to be true.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: focalDuration
BRIDGAttribute.Description: The quantity of time in which the observation result is held to be true.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: methodCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying the technique used to perform the observation.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: targetAnatomicSiteCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying the anatomic location that is the focus of the observation.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: targetAnatomicSiteLateralityCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying the side of the body (or a paired organ) that is a target site for an observation.

BRIDGClass.Name: PerformedObservationResult
BRIDGClass.Description: The finding obtained by observing, monitoring, measuring or otherwise qualitatively or quantitatively recording one or more aspects of physiologic or psychologic processes.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: baselineIndicator
BRIDGAttribute.Description: Specifies whether the result is a starting point to which other results may be compared.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: bodySystemCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying the anatomical structure that consists of organs and organ subclasses responsible for certain body functions.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: comment
BRIDGAttribute.Description: Additional description of the observation result.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: confidentialityCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying the degree of privacy applicable for the observation result.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: identifier
BRIDGAttribute.Description: The unique symbol that establishes identity of the observation result.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: reportedDate
BRIDGAttribute.Description: The date (and time) on which the result is reported.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: result
BRIDGAttribute.Description: Data or information that is determined by an act of observation.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: resultCodeModifiedText
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A character string that is a revision of the original text observation result to enable the coding of the text.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: targetAnatomicSiteCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying the anatomic location that is the focus of an observation result.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: targetAnatomicSiteLateralityCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying the side of the body (or a paired organ) that is a target site for an observation result.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: typeCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying the kind of observation result.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: uncertaintyCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying whether and to what degree this evaluation or observation has been asserted to be in doubt in any way.

BRIDGClass.Name: PerformedClinicalResult
BRIDGClass.Description: A result of a clinical observation, i.e. from an examination, test or direct observation performed on the subject.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: asCollectedIndicator
BRIDGAttribute.Description: Specifies whether the observation is represented in the units or values as originally collected.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: biomarkerIndicator
BRIDGAttribute.Description: Specifies whether a result is considered a biomarker.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: infectiousAgent
BRIDGAttribute.Description: The name of the specific microbe that the test is intended to identify.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: normalRangeComparisonCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying the relationship of a value to a normal range or reference range of values.

BRIDGAttribute.Name: reportedResultStatusCode
BRIDGAttribute.Description: A coded value specifying the phase in the lifecycle of the reported result.
